name: better-transport
title: better-transport
author: Steve_1507_and_Disconnector
description: Adds 90-degree inserters and even faster transport belts, in the colours Green, Yellow and Orange. Green transport belt 60 Items/s, Yellow transport belt: 75 Items/s, Orange transport belt: items can be placed in the middle of the belt, which allows the transport of 125 Items/s
